title: Karnıyarık
description: A traditional Turkish dish of fried eggplants stuffed with ground beef, onions, and tomatoes.
instructions: 1. Peel and fry the eggplants. 2. Cook beef with onions and tomatoes. 3. Stuff the eggplants and bake.

title: İmam Bayıldı
description: Stuffed eggplants simmered in olive oil with onions and garlic.
instructions: 1. Fry eggplants. 2. Sauté onions, garlic and tomatoes. 3. Stuff eggplants and simmer with olive oil.

title: Menemen
description: Turkish-style scrambled eggs with tomatoes and green peppers.
instructions: 1. Sauté green peppers and tomatoes. 2. Crack eggs into pan and stir. 3. Season and serve immediately.

title: Mercimek Çorbası
description: A hearty Turkish red lentil soup, perfect for any season.
instructions: 1. Rinse lentils and boil with onions and carrots. 2. Blend until smooth. 3. Season and serve hot.

title: Zeytinyağlı Fasulye
description: Cold olive oil-based string bean dish, served as a mezze.
instructions: 1. Sauté onions. 2. Add beans and tomatoes. 3. Simmer with olive oil.

title: Taze Fasulye
description: Fresh green beans cooked in tomato sauce.
instructions: 1. Sauté onions and garlic. 2. Add beans and tomato paste. 3. Simmer with water.

title: Kuru Fasulye
description: Classic Turkish white bean stew with tomato sauce.
instructions: 1. Soak beans overnight. 2. Sauté onions and tomato paste. 3. Add beans and simmer until tender.
